Zone.description: The zone struct to patch with

result.description: A message about the result like "Flushed cache"

account.description: Name of an account that added the comment

modified_at.description: Timestamp of the last change to the comment

active.description: Whether or not the key is in active use

algorithm.description: The name of the algorithm of the key, should be a mnemonic

dnskey.description: The DNSKEY record for this key

ds.description: An array of DS records for this key

privatekey.description: The private key in ISC format

published.description: Whether or not the DNSKEY record is published in the zone

Error.description: Returned when the server encounters an error. Either in client input or internally

errors.description: Optional array of multiple errors encountered during processing

Error.title: Error

metadata.description: Array with all values for this metadata kind.

RRSet.description: This represents a Resource Record Set (all records with the same name and type).

changetype.description: MUST be added when updating the RRSet. Must be REPLACE or DELETE. With DELETE, all existing RRs matching name and type will be deleted, including all comments. With REPLACE: when records is present, all existing RRs matching name and type will be deleted, and then new records given in records will be created. If no records are left, any existing comments will be deleted as well. When comments is present, all existing comments for the RRs matching name and type will be deleted, and then new comments given in comments will be created.

comments.description: List of Comment. Must be empty when changetype is set to DELETE. An empty list results in deletion of all comments. modified_at is optional and defaults to the current server time.

records.description: All records in this RRSet. When updating Records, this is the list of new records (replacing the old ones). Must be empty when changetype is set to DELETE. An empty list results in deletion of all records (and comments).

ttl.description: DNS TTL of the records, in seconds. MUST NOT be included when changetype is set to “DELETE”.

RRSet.title: RRSet

Record.description: The RREntry object represents a single record.

disabled.description: Whether or not this record is disabled. When unset, the record is not disabled

Record.title: Record

object_type.description: set to one of "record, zone, comment"

config_url.description: The API endpoint for this server’s configuration

daemon_type.description: “recursor” for the PowerDNS Recursor and “authoritative” for the Authoritative Server

url.description: The API endpoint for this server

version.description: The version of the server software

zones_url.description: The API endpoint for this server’s zones

TSIGKey.description: A TSIG key that can be used to authenticate NOTIFY, AXFR, and DNSUPDATE queries.

algorithm.description: The algorithm of the TSIG key

id.description: The ID for this key, used in the TSIGkey URL endpoint.

key.description: The Base64 encoded secret key, empty when listing keys. MAY be empty when POSTing to have the server generate the key material

TSIGKey.title: TSIGKey

Zone.description: This represents an authoritative DNS Zone.

account.description: MAY be set. Its value is defined by local policy

api_rectify.description: Whether or not the zone will be rectified on data changes via the API

dnssec.description: Whether or not this zone is DNSSEC signed (inferred from presigned being true XOR presence of at least one cryptokey with active being true)

edited_serial.description: The SOA serial as seen in query responses. Calculated using the SOA-EDIT metadata, default-soa-edit and default-soa-edit-signed settings

id.description: Opaque zone id (string), assigned by the server, should not be interpreted by the application. Guaranteed to be safe for embedding in URLs.

master_tsig_key_ids.description: The id of the TSIG keys used for master operation in this zone

masters.description: List of IP addresses configured as a master for this zone (“Slave” type zones only)

name.description: Name of the zone (e.g. “example.com.”) MUST have a trailing dot

nameservers.description: MAY be sent in client bodies during creation, and MUST NOT be sent by the server. Simple list of strings of nameserver names, including the trailing dot. Not required for slave zones.

notified_serial.description: The SOA serial notifications have been sent out for

nsec3narrow.description: Whether or not the zone uses NSEC3 narrow

presigned.description: Whether or not the zone is pre-signed

rrsets.description: RRSets in this zone (for zones/{zone_id} endpoint only; omitted during GET on the .../zones list endpoint)

slave_tsig_key_ids.description: The id of the TSIG keys used for slave operation in this zone

zone.description: MAY contain a BIND-style zone file when creating a zone

Zone.title: Zone
